meanings.def: a film or a radio or television programme giving facts about something
examples: There were some interesting interviews in the documentary.
documentary about something a television documentary about the future of nuclear power
documentary on something a documentary on the life of Henry Ford

meanings.def: giving a record of or report on the facts about something, especially by using pictures, recordings, etc. of people involved
examples: a documentary film about the war
The film was given a documentary style by the director.
